meanings.sent1: She was stringing colorful beads on a string for her bracelet.
meanings.sent2: He enjoys stringing lights around the house during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The cat was stringing a toy mouse along the floor, pretending to hunt.
meanings.sent4: The stars were stringing across the night sky like diamonds on a necklace.
meanings.sent5: The chef was stringing spaghetti into the boiling water with precision.

meanings.definition: To fit or furnish with strings.
meanings.sent1: He was stringing his guitar before the concert.
meanings.sent2: She is stringing her tennis racket with new strings for the match.
meanings.sent3: The tailor was stringing the dress with delicate ribbons.
meanings.sent4: The wind was stringing the kite high up in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The puppeteer was stringing the marionette for the puppet show.

meanings.definition: To extend in a string or strings.
meanings.sent1: The lights were stringing along the pathway, guiding the way.
meanings.sent2: The flowers were stringing across the garden, creating a beautiful border.
meanings.sent3: The vines were stringing up the trellis, reaching for the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The music was stringing through the air, filling the room with melody.
meanings.sent5: The pearls were stringing in a perfect line on the necklace.
